encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add modern punctuation; l. 5, 8 14, 15 lacuna of unknown extent; correct hyphenation in l. 6, 7, 9, 12; add ancient diaeresis in l. 8; l. 12 {μοι} -> \μοι/, correct double square brackets, spiritus on upsilon; add l. 13, l. 14 add markup for numbers and superscript lines; the the end: ---- -> lost.?lin.

Submit - Hi, I'm submitting a homework task for the Papyri workshop with Holger. I had a big problem with line 13, where I wasn't able to find out what was wrong with it and how to make it compatible with Leiden+. I tried fixing it in different ways, but there was still an error. I'm pasting it here as transcribed and with added diacritics: τῆς τοῦ // κζ_(ετους) Κομμόδου. I'm also unsure about line 15 where I wasn't sure how to indicate that there are 3 symbol gap.
Finalized - Revised text and updated metadata.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Add modern punctuation; l. 5, 8 14, 15 lacuna of unknown extent; correct hyphenation in l. 6, 7, 9, 12; add ancient diaeresis in l. 8; l. 12 {μοι} -> \μοι/, correct double square brackets, spiritus on upsilon; add l. 13, l. 14 add markup for numbers and superscript lines; the the end: ---- -> lost.?lin.

Submit - Hi, I'm submitting a homework task for the Papyri workshop with Holger. I had a big problem with line 13, where I wasn't able to find out what was wrong with it and how to make it compatible with Leiden+. I tried fixing it in different ways, but there was still an error. I'm pasting it here as transcribed and with added diacritics: τῆς τοῦ // κζ_(ετους) Κομμόδου. I'm also unsure about line 15 where I wasn't sure how to indicate that there are 3 symbol gap.
